languages.text: {n}Ваш рассказ занял долгое время. Когда вы заканчиваете, Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Значит, друкари посчитали, что ты сотрудничала с кем-то из их проклятого рода... и все — из-за Ахиллеаса? Кажется, я, помимо прочих, виноват в том, что мы с тобой сейчас здесь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш рассказ занял долгое время. Когда вы заканчиваете, Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Значит, друкари посчитали, что ты сотрудничала с кем-то из их проклятого рода... и все — из-за Ахиллеаса? Кажется, я, помимо прочих, виноват в том, что мы с тобой сейчас здесь..."

languages.text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш рассказ занял долгое время. Когда вы заканчиваете, Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Значит, друкари посчитали, что ты сотрудничала с кем-то из их проклятого рода... и все — из-за Ахиллеаса? Кажется, я, помимо прочих, виноват в том, что мы с тобой сейчас здесь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

{n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

{n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

{n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

languages.text: {n}你花了很长时间才讲完你的遭遇。当你说完之后，海因里希沉默了好几秒。{/n}“也就是说，那些该死的黑暗灵族以为你在与他们的人合作……而这一切，都是因阿吉里亚斯而起？看来，我们之所以会落得这样的下场，我和另外几个人都罪责难逃……”
languages.original_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了很长时间才讲完你的遭遇。当你说完之后，海因里希沉默了好几秒。{/n}“也就是说，那些该死的黑暗灵族以为你在与他们的人合作……而这一切，都是因阿吉里亚斯而起？看来，我们之所以会落得这样的下场，我和另外几个人都罪责难逃……”

languages.text: {n}Tardas un buen rato en terminar tu relato. Cuando acabas, Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Entonces, ¿los Drukhari pensaban que trabajaba con uno de su maldita raza... por Achilleas? Parece que soy uno de los responsables de que hayamos acabado aquí...».
languages.original_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tardas un buen rato en terminar tu relato. Cuando acabas, Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Entonces, ¿los Drukhari pensaban que trabajaba con uno de su maldita raza... por Achilleas? Parece que soy uno de los responsables de que hayamos acabado aquí...».

languages.text: {n}長い話を終えると、ハインリックスは数秒間沈黙した。{/n}「では、デュカーリは、あなたが彼らの呪われた同胞と共謀していると考えたわけだ…そして、それはすべてアキレアスのせいだったと？俺達がここにたどり着いたことには、他の何かが関わっているようだな…」
languages.original_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い話を終えると、ハインリックスは数秒間沈黙した。{/n}「では、デュカーリは、あなたが彼らの呪われた同胞と共謀していると考えたわけだ…そして、それはすべてアキレアスのせいだったと？俺達がここにたどり着いたことには、他の何かが関わっているようだな…」

languages.text: {n}Vous mettez un certain temps à lui relater toute l'histoire. Une fois que vous avez terminé, Heinrix reste silencieux pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « Ainsi, ces maudits Drukharis croyaient que vous coopériez avec l'un des leurs... et tout ça à cause d'Achilleas ? Je suis donc en partie responsable de notre présence ici... »
languages.original_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous mettez un certain temps à lui relater toute l'histoire. Une fois que vous avez terminé, Heinrix reste silencieux pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « Ainsi, ces maudits Drukharis croyaient que vous coopériez avec l'un des leurs... et tout ça à cause d'Achilleas ? Je suis donc en partie responsable de notre présence ici... »

languages.text: {n}Deine Erzählung dauert sehr lange. Als du fertig wirst, verstummt Heinrix einige Sekunden.{/n} "Die Drukhari dachten also, Ihr würdet mit einem ihrer verfluchten Artgenossen zusammenarbeiten ... und alles wegen Achilleas? Anscheinend bin ich, zusammen mit anderen, dafür verantwortlich, dass wir hier gelandet sind ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Erzählung dauert sehr lange. Als du fertig wirst, verstummt Heinrix einige Sekunden.{/n} "Die Drukhari dachten also, Ihr würdet mit einem ihrer verfluchten Artgenossen zusammenarbeiten ... und alles wegen Achilleas? Anscheinend bin ich, zusammen mit anderen, dafür verantwortlich, dass wir hier gelandet sind ..."

languages.text: {n}Anlattıkların bir hayli vakit alıyor. Heinrix, sözlerini bitirdiğinde bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Yani Drukhari, o uğursuz soydaşlarından biriyle birlikte hareket ettiğini düşündü ve... Tüm bunlar Achilleas yüzündendi, öyle mi? Diğerlerinin yanı sıra ben de kendimizi burada bulmamızda sorumluyum gibi duruyor..."
languages.original_text: {n}Your recounting takes a long time. When you finish, Heinrix is silent for several seconds.{/n} "So, the Drukhari thought that you were working with one of their accursed kind... and it was all because of Achilleas? It seems that I, among others, are responsible for us ending up here..."
